name: Cleanly Inc.
description: Provider of an online mobile application platform designed to offer on-demand laundry and dry cleaning services. The company's platform includes online booking and scheduling, enabling users to get doorstep delivery of their clean clothes easily.
one_liner: Provider of an online mobile application platform designed to offer on-demand laundry and dry cleaning services. The company's platform includes online booking and scheduling, enabling users to get doorstep delivery of their clean clothes easily.
